pageContext.description: On white-out label used for redone illustration, in LEFT UPPER CORNER::, HAND CROSS.    79   7-5   7    BM,  Crawley. Sussex., IN RIGHT UPPER CORNER OF ILLUSTRATION::, Found with 2 other rings ,  & a bronze [?tin - indecipherable], in a moss ,  at Ham [sic] Cross nr Crawley.',  Hall, Hand Cross., ON LOWER EDGE OF ILLUSTRATION:, Nickem [ indecipherable], down outer body angle. - hook end flattened - nickens []  ....    along central.  entire [?] body angle.,
pageContext.other: 2-part, hand-drawn illustration placed on white-out label, which only partially covers older illustration., Word "Bracelet" in title has been written in with different ink and handwriting., Last 3 lines of SITE info in different handwriting and ink, written over white-out label.
pageContext.composition: with serrated edge  /  formed of a square bar of metal beat into shape; notched along one angle.
pageContext.associations: Found with 2 others on a bronze ring in a moss.
